availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Arrington (Trimble County, KY, laborer)

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Kemp Arrington in Oldham County, Kentucky in November 1832. Father of William H. Arrington, Andrew Arrington, Martha Arrington, Elizabeth Arrington, Lafayette Arrington, Sarah Arrington, Ann Arrington, and George Arrington. Resident of Oldham County, Kentucky in 1840. Laborer in Trimble County, Kentucky in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 149.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, Division 2, p. 112A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film #000482444, p. 219.
